Package edu.ucr.cs.pyneapple.utils.PRUCUtils

Class Region

java.lang.Object
edu.ucr.cs.pyneapple.utils.PRUCUtils.Region
public class Region extends Object
This class describes the Region that is composed of a set of areas

  • Constructor Details

    • Region

      public Region(int region_id, Area g, double threshold, ArrayList<Area> all_areas)
      The class for a region
      Parameters:
      region_id - the index of a region
      g - the first area in the region
      threshold - the threshold constraint
      all_areas - the list of all areas

    • Region

      public Region(ArrayList<Area> areas_in_region, double threshold, double hetero, double total_extensive_attribute)
      the constructor of region class
      Parameters:
      areas_in_region - the list of all areas in the region
      threshold - the threshold constraints
      hetero - the pre-computed heterogeneity of the region
      total_extensive_attribute - the pre-computed total extensive attribute of the region
